content.text:

content.text: I'll check for the existence of all these files.<tool_call>exec command="ls -la /root/clawd/memory/nba-player-prop-research.md 2>/dev/null && echo 'YES: nba-player-prop-research.md' || echo 'NO: nba-player-prop-research.md'" />
